name: Vadine: Bite-Man
description: Decimate. Obliterate. Vadine uses his own blood to wreck his foes. Conquer 12 epic boss battles. Navigate past traps and contraptions at every corner. So have a drink to Vadine:Bite-Man!!!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: 1.5 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630, Nvidia GeForce GT 630, ATI Radeon HD 6550 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Stereo
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 10 Processor: 3.0 GHZ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 650, AMD Radeon HD 6770 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Stereo
